name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: I am Odin and this is Valhalla, the eternal battlefield

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: We’ve not much time now, so let me tell you why I’ve summoned you, noble fighter

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Yggdrasil calls out... [color=#00BFFF][i]Ragnarök[/i][/color] threatens the nine realms

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: A cataclysmic event, but one we can prevent with your help [color=#FF0000][i]WARRIOR...[/i][/color]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Collect the two powerful relics from the beasts of [color=#32CD32][i]Midgard[/i][/color] and [color=#1E90FF][i]Jotunheim[/i][/color] and return them here and together we can prevent it!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: A treacherous path awaits you, but no matter! Your noble strength will overpower all who oppose you!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Freya’s blessing is with you! Her mystical cloak of feathers will grant you immense agility!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: The power of Thor is within you! His ferocious lightning will be a great boon in your quest!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: The champion of Tyr! His mighty shield will grant you powerful protection from your foes!

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: The fate of the nine realms rests now in your hands [color=red][i]WARRIOR...[/i][/color]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: Now go forth! Onwards to [color=#32CD32][i]Midgard[/i][/color] where the first relic lies!
